inclusion.criterion: Skagen 1 Trial and therefore this study is as follows:
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Woman ≥ 18 years who had radical operation for invasive breast cancer pT1-3,
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: pN0-N3, M0 with either mastectomy or breast conservation.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: The patient can be included no matter the status of estrogen receptor, progesterone receptor,
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Axillary lymph node dissection of the axilla where the findings give indication for regional nodes radiation therapy to levels (I), II, III, IV, interpectoral
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Sentinel node biopsy documenting limited nodal disease without an indication for axillary lymph node dissection according to institutional, national or other trial guidelines.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: The patient may be a candidate for boost to the tumour bed.
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Adjuvant systemic therapy with chemotherapy, endocrine therapy and anti-HER2 treatment is accepted.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Neoadjuvant chemotherapy to downstage a cT3-cT4 or cN2-cN3 breast cancer is accepted if there is not an indication for a boost in the area of regional nodes after surgery.
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Primary systemic therapy of an operable breast cancer is accepted.
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Previous breast cancer or DCIS of the breast.
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: The patient has an indication for boost to 1 or more regional nodes.
exclusion.label: triggers
